entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 03:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
